name: City Supply Star
description:
This game started out as part of a larger project meant to educate secondary school students on the various engineering disciplines. My portion of the project, City Supply Star, has the goal of attempting to explain Industrial Engineering and its subdisciplines. The object of the game is to guide a supply truck to a set of 3 different destinations while using the least amount of fuel, demonstrating critical and efficient thinking of an Industrial Engineer.

This is my first published game (all self-created assets), so please comment on what you enjoyed and anything that I could improve upon. 

I hope you enjoy playing it!
